column2: Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince], [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetHerHis] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the silk banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetHusbandWife].\n\nIt is no mere [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetManWoman] who steps down from the litter, but a creature of pure, ethereal grace. [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetSheHeCap] does not walk across the courtyard to meet you – [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetSheHe] glides. Awe mingles with a tiny sliver of dread as you look upon [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetHerHis] emotionless face. How has a [Root.GetManWoman] like you come to deserve such a noble [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetBrideGroom]?

column2: After [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName] ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Silk Road be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable. Using [From.GetHerHis] vast influence over the wealth of the Silk Road, [From.GetTitledFirstName], coerced the traders to return to their posts.
